DOC.brief_summary: This project evaluate impact CHESS-Mammo assess participant ' health information competence , psychological distress , satisfaction doctor measure previously validate survey questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Moderating Negative Impact Abnormal Screening Mammograms
DOC.detailed_description: The study consist two part . Part 1 ( focus group ) interview 11 woman total ( 6 diagnose breast cancer 5 diagnose benign breast disease ) reinforce need online information breast diagnostic process . The focus group review online CHESS-Mammo module suggest minor change content . Part 2 ( Evaluation ) enroll 130 woman study compare one group ( 65 participant ) receive access CHESS-Mammo another group woman ( 65 participant ) receive email message contain screen mammography information . Both group Part 2 evaluated health information competence , psychological distress , patient satisfaction physician questionnaire . An evaluation group access CHESS-Mammo website do . The reason conduct part 2 study allow great insight clinical application novel Interactive Cancer Communication Systems ( CHESS-Mammo ) early diagnostic workup breast cancer . By project , may achieve important new way implement CHESS-Mammo clinic .
DOC.criteria: To eligible study , subject must : Be female least 18 year age , Have screen mammogram perform UW Breast Center , Be able read write English 6th grade level ( show , ability understand inform consent ) , Have access computer internet capability . Illiterate Homeless
DOC.keyword: Have screen mammogram perform UW Breast Center ,
Be able read write English 6th grade level ( show , ability understand inform consent ) ,
